line.text: 'You can add new templates by using the Template manager from your Personal console.'

line.comment: * add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$t, value array=$allValues, default=$fullTemplate.default, return id=null
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= ' ', alignment= 1, colour= 0, column width= 250
* $t = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.InfoText' : text='All ships require a crew of people onboard to be operational.'
* add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t

line.text: '*+* Yaki ship designs need less crew and maintenance right now (infamy).'
'*-* Yaki ship designs need more crew and maintenance right now (no infamy).'
'*** Terraformer ship designs get ignored by Xenon and OCV fleets.'
'Sector can build OCV ships. Free equipment and maintenance. But eventually they will join the OCV.'
'%. Average time until ships built here turn into OCV: '
'Sector can build Xenon ships, but no OCV ships due to a lack of abnormal signals.'
'All ships have basic extensions built-in, some classes receive extras:'
'M8: CCDS MK1, CCDS MK2, CCDS MK3, Triplex Scanner.'
'M1 and dockable M7: Transporter Device, Carrier Repair Module.'

sval.val: You can add new templates by using the Template manager from your Personal console.
*+* Yaki ship designs need less crew and maintenance right now (infamy).
*-* Yaki ship designs need more crew and maintenance right now (no infamy).
*** Terraformer ship designs get ignored by Xenon and OCV fleets.
Sector can build OCV ships. Free equipment and maintenance. But eventually they will join the OCV.
%. Average time until ships built here turn into OCV:
Sector can build Xenon ships, but no OCV ships due to a lack of abnormal signals.
All ships have basic extensions built-in, some classes receive extras:
M4 and M5: Video Enhancement Goggles.
M8: CCDS MK1, CCDS MK2, CCDS MK3, Triplex Scanner.
M1 and dockable M7: Transporter Device, Carrier Repair Module.
add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$t, value array=$allValues, default=$fullTemplate.default, return id=null
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= ' ', alignment= 1, colour= 0, column width= 250
$t = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.InfoText' : text='All ships require a crew of people onboard to be operational.'
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
